body_html:
OpenCV linking finished.
Now on my PC Visual Studio 2015 build runs with support of glog, gflags, lmdb, OpenCV, python bindings for cpu and gpu and detectron code.
Edit:
Actually, it turned out to be one more problem with Debug build, when USE_OPENCV=ON.
image_input_op.h calls TransformOnGPU which results in unresolved external

image_input_op.obj : error LNK2019: unresolved external symbol "bool __cdecl caffe2::TransformOnGPU<unsigned c
har,float,class caffe2::CPUContext>(class caffe2::Tensor &,class caffe2::Tensor *,class caffe2::Tensor &,class c
affe2::Tensor &,class caffe2::CPUContext *)" (??$TransformOnGPU@EMVCPUContext@caffe2@@@caffe2@@YA_NAEAVTensor@0@
PEAV10@00PEAVCPUContext@0@@z) referenced in function "public: virtual bool __cdecl caffe2::ImageInputOp::CopyPrefetched(void)" (?CopyPrefetched@?$ImageInputOp@VCPUContext@caffe2@@@caffe2@@UEAA_NXZ)
[D:\MyPytorch\pytorch\build\Debug\caffe2\caffe2.vcxproj]

when trying to compile caffe2.dll in Debug mode.
Here's the line:

pytorch/caffe2/image/image_input_op.h

Line 1263 in e7242cb

TransformOnGPU<uint8_t,float,Context>(prefetched_image_on_device_,

Need to fix that as well to be fully done.

body:
OpenCV linking finished.
Now on my PC Visual Studio 2015 build runs with support of glog, gflags, lmdb, OpenCV, python bindings for cpu and gpu and detectron code.
Edit:
Actually, it turned out to be one more problem with Debug build, when USE_OPENCV=ON. 
image_input_op.h calls TransformOnGPU which results in unresolved external

> image_input_op.obj : error LNK2019: unresolved external symbol "bool __cdecl caffe2::TransformOnGPU<unsigned c
>        har,float,class caffe2::CPUContext>(class caffe2::Tensor &,class caffe2::Tensor *,class caffe2::Tensor &,class c
>        affe2::Tensor &,class caffe2::CPUContext *)" (??$TransformOnGPU@EMVCPUContext@caffe2@@@caffe2@@YA_NAEAVTensor@0@
>        PEAV10@00PEAVCPUContext@0@@Z) referenced in function "public: virtual bool __cdecl caffe2::ImageInputOp<class ca
>        ffe2::CPUContext>::CopyPrefetched(void)" (?CopyPrefetched@?$ImageInputOp@VCPUContext@caffe2@@@caffe2@@UEAA_NXZ)
>        [D:\MyPytorch\pytorch\build\Debug\caffe2\caffe2.vcxproj]

when trying to compile caffe2.dll in Debug mode.
Here's the line: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/e7242cbaf24a6a33983eec27f1ad862a376b38d3/caffe2/image/image_input_op.h#L1263
Need to fix that as well to be fully done.
